summary: A romantic fairy tale about a 19-year old orphan girl who, as her sole inheritance, gets an antique key that unlocks both an old Italian villa and the secrets of her family history.
cast: Gwendolyn Anslow|Joana Cartocci|Leo Vertunni|Moose Ali Khan|Mikko Leppilampi|Elisa Cartocci|Isadora Cartocci|Joeanna Sayler|Peter O. title: The Italian Key
